All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationState
Maintains the current state of the application uses atomic variables -> actions on av are indivisible and singular, no outside observance during operation
CommandListener
listens for user input in terminal and reacts
Component
represents the component in the system.
ComponentRepository
manages component objects and enables setting, getting, deleting and searching them
ComponentService
manages interactions/operations of the component interacts with sol via UDP / HTTP service is responsible for discovering the sol, registering the component, monitoring its status, and promoting the component to sol
GalaxyController
This controller serves as an interface between HTTP requests and the GalaxyService business logic for CRUD operations on stars.
GalaxyService
manages the functionality of a system with a sol performs tasks such as registration, updates, deregistration, and discovery of stars using both HTTP and UDP protocols.
HttpHandler
Utility class for HTTP-based communication using Java 11+ HttpClient.
HttpHandler.HttpMethodType
 
InMemoryCrudRepository<K,V>
Repository interface to set guidelines for repository crud methods
Message
/** represents messages in the system.
MessageControllerV1
Rest-Controller to manage messages
MessageControllerV2
newer version of the message controller
MessageRepository
manages message objects and enables setting, getting, deleting and searching them
MessageService
handles message-related operations in the system including crud methods
NodeRole
Declares enums for thhe two states of a network member: component and sol
SecondPortFilter
custom filter to restrict or allow HTTP requests based on the port of receiving and the request paths
Sol
/** represents the sol component in the system.
SolRepository
manages sol objects and enables setting, getting, deleting and searching them
StarApplication
 
StarController
Controller for handling component registration and interactions with SOL.
StarService
responsible for managing the behavior of a sol
UdpHandler
class that handles the UDP communication in the system.
UdpHandler.HelloResponse
Inner class to represent a HELLO response.
